chapter.text: You walk towards the windows.^1500 Itâ€™s dark out, so dark you can barely see the world past a few feet.^1500 As you stare into the void you swear you can make out a figure in the darkness staring back at you.^1500 You look down at the lock, its glued shut.^1500 You peek back outside and the figure seems to be gone.^1500 You blame it on exhaustion.^1500 Wondering what time it could be, you glance at your watch.^1500 Crap, battery must be dead.
